cpl.readme:
支持导出图片, 包括指定tiddler, 固定区域, 甚至直接当作窗口截图工具 !! optional plugins dependencies * neotw-swal2: preview exported png * nprogress: progress bar for export png !! usage ```html <$tid2png text='use id' customSelector="#export" /> <$tid2png text='use class' customSelector=".export" /> <$tid2png text='use data' customSelector="[data-export]" />
export area
``` <$tid2png text='use id' customSelector="#export" /> <$tid2png text='use class' customSelector=".export" /> <$tid2png text='use data' customSelector="[data-export]" />
export area
